page.title: 15Shouldham-A day at school.4
page.content: Two children open the dinner gate for Mr.Caley and help him carry the containers into the canteen. Most of us stay for lunch-about 20 have School dinner and 12 bring a packed lunch. Mrs.Bell is the Midday Supervisory Assistant and she sees that we wash our hands before going into the canteen. Mrs.Revell serves the food and then washes up. A typical school dinner menu:- Sausage roll(hot)-potato-coleslaw- baked beans-mixed vegetables. Sponge pudding and custard Dinner playtime lasts until 1.10 when we go in again.We start the afternoon with reading,either library or books matched to our reading skills. During this time we take it in turns to read aloud either to Mrs.Rolf or Mr.Swift. We end the day with either History- Geography,Art/Craft-Science or Games.
